page.title: 06SHOPPING_TRADE
page.content:
This area of the infrastructure of the area shows signs of decline _empty shops;the most noticeable being the large premises formely housing the Co-op.
Other needs,such as banking,are catered for by the major banking houses being represented. Public houses and clubs are also well represented in this area.
For major items such as cars,furniture and electrical goods people travel to larger centres such as Newport.
Outside the main area of shops there are several small groups of shops _ usually associated with a sub post_office or public house. In this respect the population is well served and this indicates former prosperity.
